backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three implemented features (dual phone numbers, premium redesign, updated background images) to their associated source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of each frontend source file, describing their roles in the premium redesign including styling, components, and dual phone number CTAs.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, primary, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app titled 'RK Day 2 Day Facilitys' that mounts the app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that assembles the single-page layout by composing Header, Hero, Services, WhyChooseUs, Contact, and Footer in order.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Dark teal contact section displaying both phone numbers (99624 42558 and 7358440081) as tappable tel: links with call buttons, business hours, and service area info.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with brand info, quick navigation links, and both phone numbers listed as tappable tel: links with Primary/Alternate labels inside a dark teal layout.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky responsive header with scroll-aware styling, smooth-scroll navigation including a 'Why Us' link, animated mobile menu, and a desktop call button linking to the primary phone number.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Full-screen hero section with animated rotating taglines, background image with gradient overlays, and CTA buttons that scroll to contact/services sections.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: Reusable card component displaying a cleaning service with icon, title, description, feature list, optional 'Popular' highlight styling, and two phone number CTA links.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Services section rendering three ServiceCard instances (House Keeping, Deep Cleaning, Grouting) with a section header, background image, and bottom call-to-action links.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUs.tsx: Dark teal section showcasing company stats (500+ clients, 5-star rating, etc.) and a grid of six trust/differentiator cards with icons on a background image overlay.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider context and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Inter and Playfair Display fonts, sets up Tailwind base/components/utilities, defines CSS custom properties for light/dark themes using oklch colors, and declares reusable component classes and keyframe animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider (React Query) and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM root.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom oklch-based color palettes (teal, cream, semantic tokens), Inter/Playfair Display fonts, custom shadows, border radii, and animation keyframes, plus tailwindcss-animate, typography, and container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking the version, summary, existing features, and image requirements for the RK Day 2 Day Facilitys cleaning services website, including feature IDs and contact details.
